main.name: Ezhil Nilavan E
main.description: Crafting innovative full-stack solutions with Python and modern web technologies. Specializing in front-end and back-end development.
main.bio: As a passionate Python Full-Stack Developer with a robust foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I hold a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science from the University College of Engineering, Ariyalur, graduating with a CGPA of 7.5 in 2024..
